name: HTML5 Video Player
tagline: Responsive HTML5 Video Player with awesome capabilities and features
body:
Usage ======================== You can just use a standard iframe with "player.html" as the src. If you have another method, go for it, the player is responsive and will adapt to any screen size, or frame size. URL Parameters ======================== Example: player.html?videotitle=Your Video Title
ParameterDescription
videotitleTitle of the video
videourlURL Location of the video
vidIf this video is on YouTube, put the YouTube video ID
annotationText of the annotation
annlinkLink the user will navigate to when clicking on the annotation
Fully Customizable ======================== You can change any of the colors, or icons by editing "style.css". Please do not edit the JavaScript, unless absolutely necessary. Contact, Get Help & Make Requests ============== Contact me on my website for suggestions, help, and requests. Cheers!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
